componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn.

mosfetChannelType.description: doping of a transistor's channel - describes whether a transistor is n-type or p-type.

transistorCount.description: number of transistors in the package.

vgs.description: gate to source voltage difference of a MOSFET.

vgsMax.description: maximum gate to source voltage difference that can be continously applied to a MOSFET. This is a limiting value.

vds.description: drain to source voltage difference of a MOSFET.

vdsMax.description: maximum drain to source voltage difference that can be continously applied to a MOSFET. This is a limiting value.

vdsVbr.description: drain to source breakdown voltage of a MOSFET.

vgsThMax.description: maximum gate to source voltage difference required to produce a conducting path between drain and source.

vgsThTyp.description: gate to source voltage difference (vgs) required to produce a conducting path between drain and source.

vgsThMin.description: minimum gate to source voltage difference required to produce a conducting path between drain and source.

vsdDiodeVfTyp.description: typical reverse diode forward voltage when a MOSFET is in off-state.

vsdDiodeVfMax.description: maximum reverse diode forward voltage when a MOSFET is in off-state.

iDrain.description: maximum continous DC current that can flow through a MOSFET channel.This is a limiting value.

idPulsed.description: maximum pulsed DC current that can flow through a MOSFET channel.This is a limiting value.

iDss.description: drain-source leakage current of a MOSFET when the gate to source voltage difference is zero

iGss.description: gate-source leakage current of a MOSFET when the drain to source voltage difference is zero

diodeContinuousCurrent.description: maximum continuous forward current of the body diode of a MOSFET (IS).This is a limiting value.

diodePulsedCurrent.description: maximum pulsed forward current of the body diode of a MOSFET. This is a limiting value.

forwardTransconductance.description: signal gain, change in drain current with variation of gate-source voltage of a MOSFET (gFS).

rdsonTyp.description: typical on-state resistance of a MOSFET.

rdsonMax.description: maximum on-state resistance of a MOSFET.

rgTyp.description: typical internal gate resistance of a MOSFET.

rgMax.description: maximum internal gate resistance of a MOSFET.

cissTyp.description: typical input capacitance of a MOSFET.

cissMax.description: maximum input capacitance of a MOSFET.

cossTyp.description: typical output capacitance of a MOSFET.

cossMax.description: maximum output capacitance of a MOSFET.

crssTyp.description: typical reverse transfer capacitance of a MOSFET.

crssMax.description: maximum reverse transfer capacitance of a MOSFET.

qgTyp.description: typical total gate charge of a MOSFET.
qgTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgMax.description: maximum total gate charge of a MOSFET.
qgMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgdTyp.description: typical gate to drain charge of a MOSFET.
qgdTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgdMax.description: maximum gate to drain charge of a MOSFET.
qgdMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgsTyp.description: typical gate to source charge of a MOSFET.
qgsTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgsMax.description: maximum gate to source charge of a MOSFET.
qgsMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qrrTyp.description: typical reverse recovery charge of the body diode of a MOSFET.

qrrMax.description: maximum reverse recovery charge of the body diode of a MOSFET.

idVsVds.description: graph of drain current (iD) vs drain source voltage (vds).

idVsVgs.description: graph of drain current (iD) vs gate source voltage (vgs).

tdONTyp.description: typical turn-on delay time of a MOSFET
tdONTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

tdONMax.description: maximum turn-on delay time of a MOSFET
tdONMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

tdOFFTyp.description: typical turn-off delay time of a MOSFET
tdOFFTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

tdOFFMax.description: maximum turn-off delay time of a MOSFET
tdOFFMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

riseTimeTyp.description: typical rise time of a MOSFET
riseTimeTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

riseTimeMax.description: maximum rise time of a MOSFET
riseTimeMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

fallTimeTyp.description: typical fall time of a MOSFET
fallTimeTyp.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

fallTimeMax.description: maximum fall time of a MOSFET
fallTimeMax.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

trrTyp.description: typical reverse recovery time of the body diode of a MOSFET.
trrTyp.$comment: conditions include body diode forward current value and ramp rate.

trrMax.description: maximum reverse recovery time of the body diode of a MOSFET.
trrMax.$comment: conditions include body diode forward current value and ramp rate.

pTot.description: maximum power dissipation of a MOSFET.

pdVsTemp.description: graph of power dissipation vs temperature.

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties

componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

diodeCount.description: number of diodes in the package

numberOfProtectedLines.description: number of lines a diode can protect

vfTyp.description: typical forward voltage of a diode
vfTyp.comment: conditions include: forward current of diode under which a given forward voltage was measured

vfMax.description: maximum forward voltage of a diode
vfMax.comment: conditions include: forward current of diode under which a given forward voltage was measured

vfMin.description: minimum forward voltage of a diode
vfMin.comment: conditions include: forward current of diode under which a given forward voltage was measured

if.description: continuous forward current of a diode

ifm.description: maximum continuous forward current a diode can support

ifrm.description: maximum repetitive peak forward current a diode can support

ifsm.description: maximum non-repetitive surge forward current a diode can support

irTyp.comment: conditions include: reverse bias voltage under which reverse leakage current occurs

irMax.comment: conditions include: reverse bias voltage under which reverse leakage current occurs

vzTyp.description: typical breakdown voltage of a zener diode
vzTyp.comment: conditions include: minimum reverse current condition under which breakdown voltage of a zener diode is achieved

vzMax.description: maximum breakdown voltage of a zener diode
vzMax.comment: conditions include: minimum reverse current condition under which breakdown voltage of a zener diode is achieved

vzMin.description: minimum breakdown voltage of a zener diode
vzMin.comment: conditions include: minimum reverse current condition under which breakdown voltage of a zener diode is achieved

vrm.description: maximum reverse standoff voltage a tvs diode can withstand

vclTyp.description: typical clamping voltage of a tvs diode
vclTyp.comment: conditions include: surge current condition under which a tvs clamping voltage occurs

vclMax.description: maximum clamping voltage of a tvs diode
vclMax.comment: conditions include: surge current condition under which a tvs clamping voltage occurs

vclMin.description: minimum clamping voltage of a tvs diode
vclMin.comment: conditions include: surge current condition under which a tvs clamping voltage occurs

vr.description: maximum continuous reverse biased voltage a diode can support

vrrm.description: maximum repetitive reverse voltage pulses a diode can support

cd.description: diode junction capacitance - between the anode and cathode- in reverse bias condition

trr.description: reverse recovery time it takes the diode to stop conducting when its voltage changes from forward-bias to reverse-bias

pTot.description: maximum power dissipation of a forward biased diode

ifVsVf.description: graph of forward current (If) vs forward voltage (VfTyp)
